name: Death Mining
description:
A short puzzle game about a guy who died and is trying to get through purgatory. Help him escape purgatory by using ghost powers to go through walls, activate death traps, and unlock portal gates. I would like to Thanks all my Team Members without them this project isn't possible  CrazyDeveloper#5725
 JP#5295 Lazy Lids#6778 EONIK#5595 Jordan Meadows Games#8049
